result.purpose: Contains static assets and configuration files for the web application.
result.architecture: The folder follows a static asset architecture pattern, providing essential files for the web application without dynamic server-side processing.

public/index.html.purpose: Defines the structure and metadata for a web page created using React.js.
side_effects: Requires JavaScript to be enabled for full functionality.
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive information in meta tags if not properly managed.

public/manifest.json.purpose: Defines the web app manifest for a React application.

public/robots.txt.purpose: This file is used to instruct web crawlers about which pages they are allowed to access on the website.
